text: A year has passed since the civil war in Sudan began, and the situation only continues to worsen. The conflict has spread to other parts of the country, including Darfur, and the threat of famine looms large. It's unacceptable that food prices have skyrocketed by over 110% since the start of the war. We need to take action now to address the root causes of this crisis - access and funding. The international community must step up and provide the necessary support to prevent a full-blown famine.
